solution_line_template: The price of the washing machine is ${refrigerator_price} - ${washing_machine_less} = $<<{refrigerator_price}-{washing_machine_less}={washing_machine_price}>>{washing_machine_price}.
The total price of the purchases is ${refrigerator_price} + ${washing_machine_price} = $<<{refrigerator_price}+{washing_machine_price}={total_price}>>{total_price}.
